artist: Artist: Mission Mini-Comix, San Francisco; Publisher: Mission Mini-Comix, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky

title: Mission Mini-Comix: Helmet Guy
